about_the_game:
Your beloved cat has been taken. In your desperate search, you uncover something far worse than you imagined, a paranoid streamer obsessed with esoteric experiments that disrupt electricity and WiFi. His lair is a maze of eerie tech, cryptic notes, and hidden horrors. And in the shadows, something watches.

Play as a determined woman who will stop at nothing to rescue her cat from the clutches of this unstable streamer. Navigate his chaotic world, decipher his twisted mind through discarded notes and dropped keys, and unlock the secrets of the garage where he hides his captives. But every step closer to the truth draws you nearer to 'it,' a terrifying presence tied to his madness.

Will you rescue your cat and uncover the truth, or will the darkness of his experiments consume you?

content_descriptors.notes: Our game contains depictions of violence, including scenes where players may be attacked or stabbed by enemies

name: Cat Rescue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A desperate woman fights to rescue her cat from a paranoid streamer’s lair of twisted experiments, puzzles, and lurking horrors in this psychological thriller.
